biotools.summary:
Modular Breeding Program Simulator.

This repository contains our R-package MoBPS and the associated packages (miraculix/RandomFieldsUtils/MoBPSmaps). A manuscript for the package is finally available in preprint (https://www.biorxiv.org/content/10.1101/829333v1)

bioschemas.name: MoBPS
